thread.title: Chargers battle possible future stadium-mates - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8
thread.title_full: Chargers battle possible future stadium-mates - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: Video Report By Brandon Lewis, Reporter
title: Chargers battle possible future stadium-mates - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8
text:
SAN DIEGO (CBS 8) - The Chargers and the Raiders have a long, heated rivalry, but there is a possibility that the two teams could end up sharing a stadium together in Carson.
On Sunday, CBS News 8 spoke with both Chargers and Raiders fans to see how they feel about the move.
CBS News 8's Brandon Lewis has the details from Qualcomm Stadium in this video report.
